block.p: Justine Simons and Christopher Bowditch Huntington, television producers in New York, were married yesterday in Weekapaug, R.I. Associate Justice Pamela M. Macktaz of Rhode Island Family Court in Providence officiated at the Weekapaug Inn.

Ms. Simons, 31, will keep her name. She is a field producer in New York for ''Pure Oxygen,'' which covers issues of importance to women and appears on Oxygen cable television. She graduated from Tufts University. She is a daughter of Carol and Lewis M. Simons of Washington. Her father, a freelance journalist in Washington, shared the Pulitzer Prize for international reporting in 1986. Her mother is the managing editor of Modern Maturity, published by the American Association of Retired Persons in Washington.

Justine Simons and Christopher Bowditch Huntington, television producers in New York, were married yesterday in Weekapaug, R.I. Associate Justice Pamela M. Macktaz of Rhode Island Family Court in Providence officiated at the Weekapaug Inn.

Ms. Simons, 31, will keep her name. She is a field producer in New York for ''Pure Oxygen,'' which covers issues of importance to women and appears on Oxygen cable television. She graduated from Tufts University. She is a daughter of Carol and Lewis M. Simons of Washington. Her father, a freelance journalist in Washington, shared the Pulitzer Prize for international reporting in 1986. Her mother is the managing editor of Modern Maturity, published by the American Association of Retired Persons in Washington.

Mr. Huntington, 39, is the senior editorial producer of ''Moneyline News Hour'' on Cable News Network in New York. He graduated from the University of California at Berkeley and received a special diploma in social studies from Oxford University. He was a member of the United States Olympic rowing teams in 1984 and 1988. His previous marriage ended in divorce.

The bridegroom is a son of Olivia Hallowell Huntington and Lawrence S. Huntington, both of New York. His mother is a social work consultant in New York. His father is the chairman of Fiduciary Trust International, a New York investment management company.
